sentences.en: Hank Morgan is heartbroken at the end because he cannot get back to his Arthurian sweetheart.
sentences.cn: 汉克·摩根到了最后悲痛欲绝,因为他无法回到阿瑟王时代爱人的身边.

sentences.en: He rejected the religion of his forebears, leaving his own parents heartbroken.
sentences.cn: 他放弃了祖宗的宗教, 使他的双亲非常伤心.

sentences.en: He was heartbroken over losing the election.
sentences.cn: 竞选失败又使他悲痛万分.

sentences.en: Heartbroken Lamps wanted to see out his career at Stamford Bridge.
sentences.cn: 心灰意冷的弗兰克本打算在斯坦福桥结束自己的足球生涯.

sentences.en: Heartbroken, David joined the army and went to fight in Vietnam.
sentences.cn: 大卫心碎了, 参军到越南打仗去了.

sentences.en: Her untimely death at 25 made her parents heartbroken.
sentences.cn: 她25岁时英年早逝使她的父母非常伤心.

sentences.en: I've been feeling so lonely , hopeness, heartbroken sine my wife died.
sentences.cn: 自从我的娘子过世后,我一直感到空虚, 无望, 伤心.

sentences.en: Mark was heartbroken when Jane returned to her old boyfriend.
sentences.cn: 简同前男友旧情复燃，这使马克心都碎了。

sentences.en: Mr. Brooke was heartbroken and Meg began to feel sorry for him.
sentences.cn: 鲁先生很伤心,梅格开始对他感到抱歉.

sentences.en: She heartbroken at the news of her little sister's death.
sentences.cn: 听到她的小妹妹的死讯,她的心都碎了.

sentences.en: The poor maid was heartbroken at having been scolded by her master.
sentences.cn: 那可怜的女仆因被她的主人责骂而悲伤.

sentences.en: The ragtime had a cracked, heartbroken rhythm as though it were a one - step of despair.
sentences.cn: 爵士乐曲发出破碎 、 伤心的节奏,倒象是绝望的独步舞曲.

sentences.en: They were heartbroken when they learned their child was abnormal.
sentences.cn: 当获知自己的孩子畸形时他们伤心欲绝.

sentences.en: Was your daddy heartbroken when they got a divorce?
sentences.cn: 他们离婚时你爸爸是不是很伤心？

sentences.en: We were heartbroken by the news.

words.tran_cn: 悲伤或失望到难忍程度的；令人悲伤的

trans.tran_en: extremely sad because of something that has happened

trans.tran_cn: 心碎，断肠( heartbreak的过去分词 )
